Check description: When tapping the "From" field, entering a station name and selecting it from the list, the "From" field is filled with the selected value
When tapping the "To" field, entering a station name and selecting it from the list, the "To" field is filled with the selected value
When both "From" and "To" fields are filled, a route from point A to point B is built on the map
When tapping the "From" field, a panel with route history and previously built routes is displayed
By default, tapping a station on the map opens the station card
When selecting a new station, its station card is displayed
When switching device orientation from portrait to landscape, route details are displayed on the left side of the screen
The route card remains collapsed when switching from portrait to landscape orientation
The settings card remains closed when switching from portrait to landscape orientation
When long-tapping a station, the station card opens with "From here" and "To here" buttons
When long-tapping an empty area of the map, the station card closes automatically
When there is no internet connection, an error notification is displayed
